sourcesContent:
import {
  Badge,
  Box,
  Button,
  Container,
  Flex,
  Heading,
  Menu,
  MenuButton,
  Popover,
  PopoverArrow,
  PopoverBody,
  PopoverCloseButton,
  PopoverContent,
  PopoverHeader,
  PopoverTrigger,
  Stack,
  useColorModeValue,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { ShoppingCart } from "./shoppingCart";

export const MenuNav = (props) => (
  <Box
    position="fixed"
    as="nav"
    w="100%"
    bg="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)"
    css={{ backdropFilter: "blur(10px)" }}
    zIndex={1}
  >
    <Container
      display="flex"
      p={2}
      maxW="container.md"
      wrap="wrap"
      align="center"
      justify="space-between"
    >
      <Flex align="center" mr={5}>
        <Heading as="h1" size="lg" letterSpacing={"tighter"}>
          {/* <Logo /> */}
          La Voluntad
        </Heading>
      </Flex>

      <Stack>
        <Popover>
          <PopoverTrigger>
            <Button>Ver Pedido <Badge>{props.shoppingCart.length}</Badge></Button>
          </PopoverTrigger>
          <PopoverContent  maxH="90vh" maxW="90vw" w="500px">
            <PopoverArrow />
            <PopoverCloseButton />
            <PopoverHeader>Tu Pedido</PopoverHeader>
            <PopoverBody overflowY="scroll">
             <ShoppingCart shoppingCart={props.shoppingCart} />
            </PopoverBody>
          </PopoverContent>
        </Popover>
      </Stack>

      <Box flex={1} align="right">
        <Box ml={2} display={{ base: "inline-block", md: "none" }}>
          <Menu isLazy id="navbar-menu"></Menu>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Container>
  </Box>
);
